misc

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • misc.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an auxiliary class with a set of miscellaneous methods.

    This class has a set of miscellaneous methods that are usefull in different situations.

    Version:
    v0.1 03/28/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres

      • resize

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage resize(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                  int width,
                                  int height)
        Resizes an image to a specified size.

        Given a raw image, this method returns a new image resulting from the resize of the raw image.

        Parameters:
        image - a raw image to resize.
        width - the width of the resulting image.
        height - the heigh of the resulting image.
        Returns:
        a resized image.

        Parameters:
        label - the JLabel to contain the Image
        image - the Image to add to the JLabel
        Returns:
        the JLabel with the Image in it.

      • configureButton

        public static javax.swing.JButton configureButton(java.lang.String name,
                                  int pos_x,
                                  int pos_y)
        Configures a new JButton.

        Sets the name and the size of a JButton.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the resulting JButton.
        pos_x - the X position of the button.
        pos_y - the Y position of the button.
        Returns:
        a configured JButton with a name and position.
